form.name: form1

div.span: In-School Classes Cancelled for Remainder of the Year

Per the Governor's orders, there will be no in-school classes for the remainer for the 19/20 school year. All students will complete the year with remote learning. Grades PreK-3 have had workbooks sent home. Grades 4-12 will access their work online. All parents and students will want to access our new Online Learning Portal where all necessary information, links, updates, etc will be posted. Here is the link: Minford Online Learning Portal

span.div: On Wednesday, May 13, Herff Jones will be at the front entrance of the high school to deliver caps & gowns, as well as any other items you may have ordered. Herff Jones will be here from noon to 2 p.m. on that day.
You MUST pay off your order online prior to picking up your items.

You will remain in your car and drive up to the front entrance where you will state your name. Herff Jones will place your items in your car. You will not need to get out of your car so that we can maintain social distancing guidelines.

div.span: Important Announcement Regarding Graduation and Prom

br.span: Please click the Read More link for the full article.

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: inherit; color: #1c1e21; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: #ffffff

span.span: f you have an upcoming Pre-Schooler or Kindergartner, we ask that you please fill out this pre-registration form as soon as you can.

span.style: font-family: inherit; color: #1c1e21; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: #ffffff

div.span: We will follow up with you once the plan for the final registration comes together:
Governor Mike DeWine Cancels In-School Classes

span.div: Ohio Governor, Mike DeWine, has ordered all Ohio schools to remain closed for the remainder of the 2019 - 2020 academic year.
Students will continue to work from home. More information will be upcoming soon.

img.title: Online Book Fair
img.span: Online Book Fair - April 20 to May 3

div.span: We miss our library students and hope you and your families are doing well!
We will not be having our spring book fair at school this year, but we are still offering students a chance to purchase books online.
A percentage of book sales will go toward buying books for the library. All books purchased will be delivered to your homes.
If you have any questions, feel free to send an email to [email protected]
Visit this link to access our online book fair directly:
